eu.fbk.knowledgestore

Class Operation.Sparql

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.knowledgestore.Operation
      • eu.fbk.knowledgestore.Operation.Sparql
  • Enclosing class:
    Operation

    public abstract static class Operation.Sparql
extends Operation
    SPARQL query operation.

    This operation evaluates a SPARQL query on the KnowledgeStore SPARQL endpoint. All SPARQL query forms are supported:

    • SELECT queries return a Stream of BindingSets (call execTuples());
    • CONSTRUCT and DESCRIBE queries return a Stream of Statements (call execTriples());
    • ASK queries return a boolean result (call execBoolean()).

    The operation can be configured, as usual, by specifying a timeout and supplying optional namespace bindings to be used for parsing the SPARQL expression. In addition, default and named graphs can be specified at the operation level, overriding the corresponding declarations in the FROM and FROM NAMED clauses of the SPARQL query expression.

    • Nested Class Summary

        expression - the SPARQL query expression, not null and possibly containing $$ placeholders
        arguments - the values to assign to $$ placeholders
        Throws:
        ParseException - in case the query expression is not valid

      • execTuples

        public final Stream<org.openrdf.query.BindingSet> execTuples()
                                                      throws OperationException
        Evaluates the query, returning a Stream with the resulting BindingSets; applicable to SELECT queries. After access to the returned Stream, a List<String> with output variables can be obtained by querying the Stream metadata attribute variables.
        Returns:
        the resulting Stream of BindingSets
        Throws:
        OperationException - on failure (see possible outcome status codes)

      • doExec

        protected abstract <T> Stream<T> doExec(@Nullable
                                        Long timeout,
                                        Class<T> type,
                                        String expression,
                                        @Nullable
                                        Set<org.openrdf.model.URI> defaultGraphs,
                                        @Nullable
                                        Set<org.openrdf.model.URI> namedGraphs)
                                 throws OperationException
        Implementation method responsible of executing the SPARQL operation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of result elements
        Parameters:
        timeout - the optional timeout for the operation; null if there is no timeout
        type - the expected type of elements for the resulting Stream; either Statement, BindingSet or Boolean
        expression - the SPARQL query expression
        defaultGraphs - the optional set of default graphs overriding the ones possibly specified in the FROM query clause; if null, no override should take place
        namedGraphs - the optional set of named graphs overriding the ones possibly specified in the FROM NAMED query clause; if null, no override should take place
        Returns:
        a Stream with the result of the query
        Throws:
        OperationException - in case of failure (see possible outcome status codes)
